com.konakart.appif

Interface ReviewsIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Reviews

    public interface ReviewsIf
    This is normally the object returned for API calls returning an array of Reviews. It contains an array of reviews and the total number of reviews matching the request, so that they can be paged. I also may contain the average rating for all reviews and an array of rating facets showing the number of reviews present for each rating.
